text: Three and One-half Fathom Ledge in Massachusetts, is a small barren rock in Massachusetts Bay, located within the city limits of Boston, USA. The rock is northeast of Martin Ledge and far east of the Roaring Bulls. ==External links== *Topo map Category:Islands of Massachusetts Category:Landforms of Boston Category:Islands of Suffolk County, Massachusetts Category:Coastal islands of Massachusetts
title: Three and One-half Fathom Ledge
